A widely used semi-automatic pistol known for its lightweight polymer frame, high magazine capacity, and exceptional reliability. Its simple yet effective design makes it a favorite among military, law enforcement, and stalkers alike. With a smooth trigger pull and low recoil, it provides a dependable sidearm for both defensive and offensive situations.
